data.meta_site_name: Michael Bauer Obituary | January 8, 2022 | Smith Family Funeral Home - Green Forest, AR
data.text:
The exciting moments of pregnancy have turned to sorrow and heartfelt loss with the death of precious baby boy, Michael Dale Bauer, on Saturday, January 8, 2022.

He leaves behind his loving family who will always love him: parents Kevin Bauer and Hollie Cornett of Green Forest along with 2 wonderful sisters, Katie Bauer, age 6, and Daisy Bauer, age 4. He also leaves behind a grandfather, Marvin “Poppy” Cornett of Green Forest.

Cremation arrangements have been entrusted to Smith Family Funeral Home, Green Forest, AR.
